name: Slamdunk
body:
### Welcome to Slamdunk.

Slamdunk is a tool to maps and analyzes SLAM-Seq data. More info to come.

### Documentation

Detailled documentation on how to use Slamdunk is hosted on [Read The Docs](https://http://slamdunk.readthedocs.io/).

### Authors and Contributors

Slamdunk is developed by [Tobias Neumann](mailto:tobias.neumann.at@gmail.com) (@t-neumann) and [Philipp Rescheneder](mailto:philipp.rescheneder@univie.ac.at) (@philres).

Philipp also develops and maintains [NextGenMap](http://cibiv.github.io/NextGenMap/), a flexible and fast read mapping program Slamdunk leverages on for its analysis.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
